subtitleNullable: Pizza photos and corresponding segmentation masks for the ingredients
descriptionNullable:
# Food Segmentation Object Detection dataset
The dataset consists of two types of data: **pizza photos** and **mask segmentations**.

# 💴 For Commercial Usage: To discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset, leave a request on **[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/semantic-food-segmentation?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=food-segmentation)** to buy the dataset

# Pizza Photos 
The pizza photos are images of pizzas taken from different angles and under different lighting conditions. 
They are available in the folder "Images". 

## OTHER DATASETS WITH SEGMENTATION:
- **[Bald People Segmentation Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/bald-people-segmentation-dataset)**
- **[Body Segmentation - 5,300 Photos](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/human-segmentation-dataset)**
- **[Vehicle Images & Segmentation](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/car-masks)**
- **[Agricultural Image Segmentation](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/plantations-segmentation)**
- **[GENERATED USA Passports Segmentation ](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/trainingdatapro/generated-passports-segmentation)**

# Semantic Masks
The mask segmentations are images that highlight the pizza ingredients by assigning each ingredient a unique color:
- Pizza crust boundaries - #99d9ea
- Slightly burnt crust edges - #ff3a3a
- Pepperoni or sausage - #d3ead3
- Ham - #ff9500
- Ground beef - #50acf3
- Tomato - #fff1cc
- Olives - #ff95d2
- Mushrooms - #bcff7b

The complete list of highlighted elements and the assigned colors of the pizzas is available in the `masks_info.csv` file.

# 💴 Buy the Dataset: This is just an example of the data. Leave a request on **[https://trainingdata.pro/datasets](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/semantic-food-segmentation?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=food-segmentation)** to discuss your requirements, learn about the price and buy the dataset

**[TrainingData](https://trainingdata.pro/datasets/semantic-food-segmentation?utm_source=kaggle&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=food-segmentation)** provides high-quality data annotation tailored to your needs.

*keywords: food segmentation dataset, food image dataset, semantic segmentation of food, food instance segmentation, food recognition dataset, food classification dataset, semantic segmentation dataset*
